last_episode_to_air.name: St. Valentine's Day Massacre
last_episode_to_air.overview: Capone uses the St. Valentine's Day Massacre to assert his power over his enemies.  Meanwhile, President Hoover takes notice; and dispatches Elliot Ness to take on Capone.

name: The Making of The Mob
overview: A docudrama series chronicling some of America's most notorious mobsters, each season dealing with a different city/region.

seasons.name: New York
seasons.overview: Season 1 begins in 1905 and spans over 50 years to trace the rise of Charles “Lucky” Luciano, Meyer Lansky, Benjamin “Bugsy” Siegel and other notorious gangsters from their beginnings as a neighborhood gang of teenagers to murderous entrepreneurs and bootleggers who organized the criminal underworld, turning the Mafia into an American institution.

seasons.name: Chicago
seasons.overview: Season 2 chronicles the rise and fall of iconic gangster Al Capone, as well as the story of his successors, collectively known as “The Chicago Outfit.” Spanning the better part of a century, the series begins with Capone’s early days in New York and continues through his move to Chicago - to work with his childhood mentor in the underworld.

episodes.name: The Education of Lucky Luciano
episodes.overview: Charles "Lucky" Luciano arrives in New York, teaming with Meyer Lansky and Bugsy Siegel. During Prohibition, Luciano's crew makes a fortune.

episodes.name: Equal Opportunity Gangster
episodes.overview: "Lucky" Luciano gains power in the New York underworld during Prohibition. When two bosses start a mob war, Luciano plans to kill them both.

episodes.name: King of New York
episodes.overview: "Lucky" Luciano takes over the New York mob, organizing the Five Families. As Luciano's power grows, so does the attention from the Feds.

episodes.name: A Rising Threat
episodes.overview: Luciano's decision to enter the prostitution business gives Thomas Dewey the chance to arrest him and put him on trial.

episodes.name: Exit Strategy
episodes.overview: Luciano is found guilty of running a prostitution ring and goes to prison, leaving Vito Genovese as acting boss.

episodes.name: The Mob at War
episodes.overview: World War II begins, and the military asks Luciano to aid in the invasion of Sicily. Thomas Dewey considers letting him go.

episodes.name: New Frontiers
episodes.overview: Luciano takes over Vito Genovese's heroin ring in Italy, then rejoins Meyer Lansky at a mob summit in Cuba. Genovese and Carlo Gambino plot against the mob leadership, and Bugsy Siegel's dream of Las Vegas turns deadly.

episodes.name: End Game
episodes.overview: Vito Genovese and Carlo Gambino make their move. The police raid a mob summit, arresting Genovese. Gambino takes over.

1.name: New York
1.overview: Season 1 begins in 1905 and spans over 50 years to trace the rise of Charles “Lucky” Luciano, Meyer Lansky, Benjamin “Bugsy” Siegel and other notorious gangsters from their beginnings as a neighborhood gang of teenagers to murderous entrepreneurs and bootleggers who organized the criminal underworld, turning the Mafia into an American institution.

episodes.name: Capone's First Kill
episodes.overview: In the second season opener, Johnny Torrio mentors Capone in Brooklyn, and then the two reunite in Chicago, where their bootlegging enrages local Irish gangsters.

episodes.name: A Death in the Family
episodes.overview: A new mayor forces Torrio and Capone outside Chicago to nearby Cicero.  There, Capone's brother Frank fixes an election, placing himself in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Blood Filled Streets
episodes.overview: A betrayal destroys peace in Chicago and Torrio and Capone seek revenge against the Irish gangs.  Meanwhile, the Beer Wars make Capone Chicago's top gangster.

episodes.name: St. Valentine's Day Massacre
episodes.overview: Capone uses the St. Valentine's Day Massacre to assert his power over his enemies.  Meanwhile, President Hoover takes notice; and dispatches Elliot Ness to take on Capone.

episodes.name: Judgment Day
episodes.overview: Al Capone outwits Eliot Ness, but Capone's criminal empire remains in jeopardy when the IRS plants an undercover agent in his gang.

episodes.name: New Blood
episodes.overview: With Capone in jail, Frank Nitti, Paul Ricca and Joe Accardo take over.  Meanwhile, a Hollywood scandal presents Sam Giancana with a chance to prove himself.

episodes.name: Sin City
episodes.overview: Joe Accardo sets his sights on Las Vegas, but the Outfit is threatened when Sam Giancona incurs the wrath of young attorney Robert F. Kennedy.

episodes.name: Last Man Standing
episodes.overview: In the second-season finale, Joe Accardo and Sam Giancana have a falling out, and the fate of the Outfit rests on the outcome. Meanwhile, Joe Accardo cleans up loose ends before retiring.

2.name: Chicago
2.overview: Season 2 chronicles the rise and fall of iconic gangster Al Capone, as well as the story of his successors, collectively known as “The Chicago Outfit.” Spanning the better part of a century, the series begins with Capone’s early days in New York and continues through his move to Chicago - to work with his childhood mentor in the underworld.
